resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/156841</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>156841</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>ILMoE</catalog>
            <entry>ILMoE2302</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Motion of bodies in the absence of friction</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Bewegung der Körper in Ermangelung der Friktion</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Mouvement des corps en l'absence du frottement</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Movimento dos corpos na ausência da fricção</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Movimento dei corpi in assenza di attrito</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Κίνηση των οργανισμών ελλείψει της τριβής</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Movimiento de cuerpos en ausencia de la fricción</string>
          </title>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="en">An animation which explores motion in the absence of friction, where the user can adjust the mass of the bodies in motion and the types of collisions which they incur.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">physics</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">mechanics</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">motion</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Eine Animation, die Bewegung in Ermangelung der 
Friktion erforscht, in der der Benutzer die Masse der Körper in der 
Bewegung und die Typen auf der Zusammenstöße justieren kann, die sie
sich nehmen.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Une animation qui explore le mouvement en 
l'absence du frottement, où l'utilisateur peut ajuster la masse des 
corps dans le mouvement et les types de collisions qu'elles encourent.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Um animation que explore o movimento na ausência 
da fricção, onde o usuário pode ajustar a massa dos corpos no 
movimento e os tipos de colisões que incorrem.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Una animazione che esplora il movimento in assenza
di attrito, dove l'utente può registrare la massa dei corpi nel 
movimento ed i tipi di scontri che subiscono.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Μια ζωτικότητα που ερευνά την κίνηση ελλείψει της 
τριβής, όπου ο χρήστης μπορεί να ρυθμίσει τη μάζα των 
οργανισμών στην κίνηση και τους τύπους συγκρούσεων που 
υφίστανται.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Una animación que explora el movimiento en 
ausencia de la fricción, donde el utilizador puede ajustar la masa de
los cuerpos en el movimiento y los tipos de colisiones que incurran 
en.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Physik</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Mechaniker</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Bewegung</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">physique</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">mécanique</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">mouvement</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">física</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">mecânicos</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">movimento</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">fisica</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">meccanici</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">movimento</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">φυσική</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">μηχανικοί</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">κίνηση</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">física</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">mecánicos</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">movimiento</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
